metadata.Title: CVE-2017-12979 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: DokuWiki through 2017-02-19c has stored XSS when rendering a malicious language name in a code element, in /inc/parser/xhtml.php. An attacker can create or edit a wiki with this element to trigger JavaScript execution.

criterions.comment: dokuwiki package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.0.20180422.a-2').
